results.title: Abnormal vaginal bleeding following pharmacist prescribing of metformin leads to the detection of complex endometrial hyperplasia.
results.text_hl: Abnormal @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014592 @@@vaginal bleeding@@@ following pharmacist prescribing of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ leads to the detection of complex @DISEASE_Endometrial_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D004714 @@@endometrial hyperplasia@@@.

citations.NLM: Lyster RL, Houle SK. Abnormal vaginal bleeding following pharmacist prescribing of metformin leads to the detection of complex endometrial hyperplasia. Ann Pharmacother. 2013 Nov;47(11):1581-3. PMID: 24285770
citations.BibTeX: @article{24285770, title={Abnormal vaginal bleeding following pharmacist prescribing of metformin leads to the detection of complex endometrial hyperplasia.}, author={Lyster RL and Houle SK}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={47}, number={11}, pages={1581-3}}

results.title: Antiproliferative effect of metformin on the endometrium--a clinical trial.
results.text_hl: MATERIALS AND METHODS: A total of 43 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who were referred to our center for @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014592 @@@abnormal uterine bleeding@@@ and had a histologic diagnosis were @DISEASE_Endometrial_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D016889 @@@disordered proliferative endometrium@@@ or simple @DISEASE_Endometrial_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D004714 @@@endometrial hyperplasia@@@ were included and randomly distributed in two groups treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (500mg @CHEMICAL_4_benzamido_4'_isothiocyanostilbene_2_2'_disulfonate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032526 @@@Bid@@@) or @CHEMICAL_Megestrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008535 @@@megestrol@@@ (40mg daily), respectively, for three months.

citations.NLM: Tabrizi AD, Melli MS, Foroughi M, Ghojazadeh M, Bidadi S. Antiproliferative effect of metformin on the endometrium--a clinical trial. Asian Pac J Cancer Prev. 2014;15(23):10067-70. PMID: 25556427
citations.BibTeX: @article{25556427, title={Antiproliferative effect of metformin on the endometrium--a clinical trial.}, author={Tabrizi AD and Melli MS and Foroughi M and Ghojazadeh M and Bidadi S}, journal={Asian Pac J Cancer Prev}, volume={15}, number={23}, pages={10067-70}}
